document.full_text: the worst economic slump in decades was hailed as the beginning of the end of male dominance in the labor market. but the legacy of the recession may be less, not more, gender equality.
document.title: the female factor: recession seen taking toll on gender equality
lines_and_colors: the worst economic slump in decades was hailed as the beginning of the end of male dominance in the labor market. but the legacy of the recession may be less, not more, gender equality.
